citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11AM on Monday
March 20, 2023. Inspectors were able to contact the licensee by phone and he confirmed that he was unavailable due to
a change in work hours and would be unable to return to facilitate an inspection.
Additional Inspectors:
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11AM on Monday 
March 20, 2023.  Inspectors were able to contact the licensee by phone and he confirmed that he was unavailable due to 
a change in work hours and would be unable to return to facilitate an inspection. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Jonathan Tomkovitch, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
